query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ab_assignments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  experimentId INT NOT NULL,
  variantId INT NOT NULL,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  assignedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  outcome ENUM('success', 'failure', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  outcomeMetrics JSON,
  INDEX idx_experimentId (experimentId),
  INDEX idx_studentId (studentId),
  INDEX idx_variantId (variantId),
  UNIQUE KEY unique_experiment_student (experimentId, studentId)
)
command:

  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  experimentId INT NOT NULL,
  variantId INT NOT NULL,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  assignedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  completedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  outcome ENUM('success', 'failure', 'pending') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  outcomeMetrics JSON,
  INDEX idx_experimentId (experimentId),
  INDEX idx_studentId (studentId),
  INDEX idx_variantId (variantId),
  UNIQUE KEY unique_experiment_student (experimentId, studentId)
)
